mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(login_id, password, name, role, status, phone_number, email, created_at, created_by) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{role}, #{status}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT id, login_id, password, name, role, status, phone_number, email FROM user WHERE id = #{id};
